page.title: 02Tourists
page.content: Many People do not like being invaded by the tourists except the handful of traders who benefit financially. Each year at the end of August the 'Peace Women' come for a short festival and to receive 'vibrations' from the stones. Most villagers are against their visit but some find them interesting and harmless. When large numbers of people descend on the area, precautions are taken by local people especially farmers who block field entrances with farm machinery. One carpark in the area is blocked with barbed wire by the police
